thread.title: Nest just shared a whole bunch of hilarious security cam videos (GOOG, GOOGL)
thread.title_full: Nest just shared a whole bunch of hilarious security cam videos (GOOG, GOOGL)

author: Kif Leswing
title: Nest just shared a whole bunch of hilarious security cam videos (GOOG, GOOGL)
text:
print 
Nest's $200 home camera. Nest Home security cameras, like the Nest Cam, are supposed to catch when a burglar is breaking into your house, or other useful video.
But they also capture some of life's funniest moments, too, like when someone falls down or a pet does something absolutely adorable. 
Nest, an Alphabet company, shared on Wednesday what it calls "The Nesties," some of the most compelling home camera videos its users have shared with the Google cousin. Nest has added background music. 
Some of the videos are laugh-out-loud funny. Take a look: So that's what the mail carrier does when nobody's looking. If you look closely, the mailman actually falls out of the truck. 
When the pup has an itch it can't reach. 
This adorable father-son bonding experience was recorded on a Nest home camera. 

This video has a plot with a beginning, middle, and end, and gives you a hero to root for. (The dog.) 
The kids don't even wake up at first! 
Imagine how many falls and slips security cameras have recorded. 
Nature is majestic â€” although the deer in this video might not agree.
